name: React Employee Directory
imgTxt: An application using React. The user can filter and sort the data.

name: Work Out Tracker
imgTxt: Work Out Tracker using MongoDB. The user can add work out data, and the charts on the dashboard will automatically update.

name: Space Invaders
imgTxt: The second project in the bootcamp. This application allows the user to log-in, reset their password, and play space invaders!

name: Eat Da Burger
imgTxt: A simple application that allows the user to add burgers to a MySQL database.

name: Wedding Scheduler Around Golden Hour
imgTxt: The first project in the bootcamp. This application allows the user to set the location of a wedding, photo location, and reception to plan around golden hour.

name: Weather App
imgTxt: This application shows the next 5 days weather for any city searched, and uses local storage to show pervious cities searched.

name: Coding Quiz
imgTxt: A timed multiple select quiz that shows the user a high score on completion.

name: Day Planner
imgTxt: A day planner that uses local storage to set meetings in a day.
